title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 941.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 941.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located in the upper Hudson
river drainage basin within New York State excluding the Hoosic River drainage
basin, as outlined on map 1, section
941.7, infra, and as contained
within the topographic limit line shown on reproduced topographical maps
herein, excluding the waters contained within the boundaries of State-owned
forest preserve lands, and the waters of Loon Lake, Brant Lake, Friends Lake
and their tributaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
941.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
